Scriptal.Name: Mark As Target
Scriptal.Description: Displays a Quest Target marker on the Game Object. Accepts both GameObjectIds and GameObject Names. Note: For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. Note: This operation is purely visual and does not handle actual target logic.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempVal = |[1|STRING,NUMBER]| if type(tempVal) == "string" then tempVal = GetGameObjectId(tempVal) end TppMarker.EnableQuestTargetMarker(tempVal) TppSoundDaemon.PostEvent"sfx_s_enemytag_quest_tgt"

Choice.Name: Value
Choice.Description: The new value for the key.
